pageContext.claim: “Dan Bishop was down 17 points 3 weeks ago. He then asked me for help, we changed his strategy together, and he ran a great race. Big Rally last night. Now it looks like he is going to win.  @CNN & @MSNBC are moving their big studio equipment and talent out. Stay tuned!”
pageContext.analysis: Bishop was locked in a tough race, but it’s not clear which poll had him 17 points down. The Post reported a poll published on Aug. 30 had his opponent up by four points, but that was within the margin of error.
